participant_1.background:
My ethnicity is not important, but my feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
I'm proud of my swimming achievements in college and I'd brag to my friends about them if I were famous.
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
i will one day own a ferret.
my favorite food is steak.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to visit my brother in another city.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
i trust in god.
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.
My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Doing well, what about yourself?
Pretty good. I'm going to visit my brother in another city soon.
That sounds like fun! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks. I'm excited to see him.
I'm sure he's excited to see you too.
I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim, bike, and play video games.
Those sound like fun hobbies. I like to blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
Oh that's interesting. I've never had a salt water aquarium.
It's fun, but it can be a lot of work.
I bet it can. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
I love animals. I have a dog and a ferret.
Ferrets are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're great pets. They're really playful and affectionate.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'll have to get one someday.
You should. They're great companions.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation
